# ChoreChart - Roommate Chore Tracking App

## Project Overview
A mobile-first web application for tracking chores between two roommates: Aleem and Daniyal.

## Tech Stack
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite as build tool
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Local Storage for data persistence

## Features
- Persistent authentication (stay logged in)
- Calendar-based chore tracking
- Alternating chore assignments
- Trash tally tracking
- Comments and media attachments on chores
- Special "tutorial" and "good boy" features for Daniyal

## Chore Schedule
- Sweeping & Mopping: Alternating days between Aleem and Daniyal
- Kitchen Cleaning: Alternating days between Aleem and Daniyal
- Veranda Cleaning: Once per week
- Toilet & Bathroom: Once per week
- Trash: No fixed schedule, tally-based tracking

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with hooks
- Store all data in localStorage for persistence
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Keep UI simple and easy to use with one-tap check-offs
